name: Dushman Remover
description:
This game is a line defense game ! It is submitted for the Nokia3310 4th Game Jam 

You play a canon in a castle and your goal is to destroy the incoming waves of "Dushman".

Dushman means actually "enemy" from Turkish.

The more you remove enemies, the more you collect money which allows you to purchase upgraded and strengthen tower  and cannon !

Beware of those "Dushman", they might remove your defence before you remove them!

Controls :

Nokia key

Computer Key

Action

Nokia 11 or Numpad 1upgrade tower heightNokia 22 or Numpad 2upgrade tower defenseNokia 3/Not usedNokia 44 or Numpad 4upgrade cannon attack speedNokia 55 or Numpad 5upgrade cannon rotation speedNokia 66 or Numpad 6upgrade cannon power and rangeNokia 77 or Numpad 7open upgrades menuNokia 8/Not usedNokia 99 or Numpad 9nuke the enemiesNokia 0Left Arrow or Entershoot !Nokia #Up arrow or Numpad Plusrotate the cannon upNokia -Down Arrow or Numpad Minusrotate the cannon down

Credits

ABD-Z (Me) :  Design, Graphics, Animation

Madour: Programming, Audio
